Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 32nd overall pick, by Colorado in 2017...
Traded from Colorado to Chicago on 3/2/2017 (Going to COL: C Sandwich Pick Trade. Going to CHI: P Benjamin Haupt)...
Injured on 4/23/2017 with a Dislocated Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Chicago to New York on 7/25/2017 (Going to NY: P Benjamin Haupt. Going to CHI: P Jeremy Fletcher, P Raymond Zerbe, P Bruce Wachtel)...
Traded from New York to Atlanta on 6/10/2018 (Going to NY: P Timothy Egerton. Going to ATL: P Benjamin Haupt, P Jame Meany, P Joseph Hedgepeth, P Phillip Reed)...
Earned first career win on 7/4/2018...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/2018, going 6-0, 1.26...
Traded from Atlanta to Detroit on 6/15/2021 (Going to ATL: RF Gregory Arrington. Going to DET: P Benjamin Haupt)...
